abstract: Comcast is squeezing more high definition cable networks onto its systems, causing some users to notice lower picture quality. Its defense: Everyone else does it.
snippet: Comcast is squeezing more high definition cable networks onto its systems, causing some users to notice lower picture quality. Its defense: Everyone else does it.
lead_paragraph: Not only has Comcast been slowing down Internet users exchanging files with the BitTorrent protocol, it has been quietly reducing the quality of some high definition television networks it carries as well.
